text: Paige Saunders is a Canadian social entrepreneur. He is the founder of the Zhaojin Yellowknife Academy which is headquartered in Zhaoyuan, Shandong, China. He is a former partner in CloudWorks Adventure Capital and a current partner in the news startup Verge Communications. He is part of the creative collective Sailing On Sound which created the online component of the documentary Shadow of a Giant as well as their own podcast and creative projects. He was the Chair of the Canadian non-profit Food First from 2011 to 2013 and founded the electronic democracy group IserveU in 2012 which has the world's only current e-Democracy candidate in office. He currently makes YouTube videos about civic issues and democracy in Montreal. ==References== * * * * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Paige Saunders
